issue.title: cloudsim_bridge docker image error on last step

content.raw:
Hi Alfredo, 

After downloading the missing file and running the image I get this error: 

overlord@venture:~/cloudsim\_bridge\_docker$ ./run.bash cloudsim\_bridge robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_2  
xauth:  file /tmp/.docker.xauth does not exist  
standard\_init\_linux.go:211: exec user process caused "permission denied"

Any ideas what could be wrong?
content.html:
Hi Alfredo,

After downloading the missing file and running the image I get this error:

overlord@venture:~/cloudsim_bridge_docker$ ./run.bash cloudsim_bridge robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_2
xauth: file /tmp/.docker.xauth does not exist
standard_init_linux.go:211: exec user process caused "permission denied"

Any ideas what could be wrong?
